Text: HiHi Monika Im back in Spore after almost hrs on plane terrible long flight Such a pity that I spend so little time with u hope to make up next time for a drink Stay in touch and who knows what will happen Call me if u need to touch Spore is about hours ahead of Houston You can reach me anytime by cellular Cheers Leslie Then Enron Industrial Markets B Orchard Road Ngee Ann City Tower B Singapore Tel Fax Mobile Email

Keep in touchMonica Our end might be imminent but lets make an effort to stay in touch Other than losing a stable source of income the sad thing is losing touch with a bunch of awesome people like you Anyway my email and number asf Mobile Whats yours Cheers Leslie Then Enron Industrial Markets B Orchard Road Ngee Ann City Tower B Singapore Tel Fax Mobile Email
